snippet.title: Riddick: The Merc Files [HD]
snippet.description:
This video based on my walkthrough of the mobile stealth-action game "Riddick: The Merc Files".
I made it look like a short movie. 

❗️ This video for all Riddick fans. And if you want to support my channel: https://www.donationalerts.com/r/deealup 

❗️ All my videos about Riddick: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLX-z-wc20ce4CYD-7zc03wMea1MGvK3Ft

▶️ Features:
◾️ Upscaled to 1440p.
◾️ Scaled to 16:9.
◾️ Some HUD elements removed.

▶️ About the game:
Riddick: The Merc Files is a top-down view mobile stealth-action game, developed by Gaming Corps and Vin Diesel's company Tigon Studios. The game was released in September 20. 2013 for iOS and Android phones.

▶️ Plot:
Riddick is hunted by mercenaries on the Dunes, and sneaks around in the shadows avoiding and hunting them.

🕑 Chapters:
00:00:00 - Intro
00:01:02 - Gameplay
00:15:13 - Outro

▶️ Game Creators:
Developed by Gaming Corps and Tigon Studios. 

#riddick #vindiesel
